item.title: This Health Startup Aims To Cut Down A Burdensome Chunk Of Doctors’ Paperwork
item.description: Medallion is setting up a national clearinghouse to streamline a healthcare credentialing process that costs more than $1 billion annually.

item.title: Delete Any Texts On Your iPhone Or Android If You See This Word
item.description: These 3 letters spell danger — every single time.
